User MPC Memory Management

NMF user could allocate memory chunk issued from memories under NMF control. Furthermore, he can access such memory by getting address where the host seen it. By default, only the kernel could access such memory which are not mapped in the user space land.

In case where OS integration model want to allow user application to access such memory, the CM driver must either:

  • remap the buffer in the user space and unmap it when the handle are freed,
  • map the whole memory segment gived by CM_AddSdramMemorySegment in the user space.
